meanings: [명사] remodeling, [동사] remodel, convert (sth to/into sth), renovate

vlive.korean: 개조해서... - 근데 꼭 그런 거 있었어 - 말도 안 되게 만들어서 - 쇠? I transformed it. - You know... - It was amazing. - By using steel? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: I transformed it. - You know... - It was amazing. - By using steel?

vlive.korean: '내일해' 의상을 새로 이렇게 개조를 개조? With the "LADY" outfits... Remodeling? Remodeling? 듣기 View video EXID : [EXID(이엑스아이디)] 슈퍼콘서트 & 부산 원아시아페스티벌 스케치
차를 개조해서 캠핑카 처럼 만들었거든요. He modified his car as a camping car. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Baby Boo - 베이비부 '키스해주세요~'
vlive.english: He modified his car as a camping car.

vlive.korean: [근대 가옥을 개조한 커피숍 구경 중] 예쁘다. [Coffee shop at an old building] Pretty. 듣기 View video V Special : [꽃브로] JUNG JOONYOUNG &ROY KIM EP1. "Train to Mokpo"
vlive.english: [Coffee shop at an old building] Pretty.

vlive.korean: 굉장히 어려운데 그거. - 개조도 할 수 있잖아요. That's really hard. - You can remodel them, too. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [THE BOYZ] V LIVE
vlive.english: That's really hard. - You can remodel them, too.

examples.korean: There will be extensive renovations to the hospital. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 병원에 대해 대대적인 개조 작업이 있을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Many large old houses have been converted into flats. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오래된 대저택들이 많이 아파트식으로 개조되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many large old houses have been converted into flats. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The stables have been imaginatively converted into offices. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 마구간들은 창의적으로 개조하여 사무실로 만들어 놓았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The stables have been imaginatively converted into offices. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They live in a converted barn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 헛간을 (집으로) 개조한 곳에서 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They live in a converted barn. Add to Wordbook
